pageProduct.name: Sukin Deep Cleanse Purifying Tonic 125ml Spray
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Removes Product Build Up, Pollutants &Excess Oils With Apple Cider Vinegar &Maize Complex To Balance The Scalp.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

With Aha’S Naturally Sourced From Apple Cider Vinegar To Remove Product Build-Up, Excess Oils & Pollutants Without Stripping The Scalp. Native Australian River Mint And Maize Complex Leaves Your Scalp Feeling Balanced And Healthy.

Ingredients

Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Aloebarbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Vinegar Extract (Apple Cider), Algae Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Mentha Australis Leaf Extract (River Mint), Mentha Piperita (Peppermint)Leaf Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger)Root Extract, Santalum Acuminatum Fruit Extract (Quandong), Backhousia Citriodora Leaf Oil (Lemon Myrtle), Sorbitol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate, Sodium Surfactin, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Tromethamine, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Hexyl Cinnamal***Natural Fragrance**Component Of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Section Dry Hair And Spray Directly Onto The Scalp. Repeat Until Scalp Is Covered. Leave For 1 Minute, Follow With Sukin Shampoo. Use Once Or Twice Weekly.
